com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCExtendedTableLinkProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCExtendedTableLinkProvider

  • public abstract class YRCExtendedTableLinkProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    The link provider is used to display table columns with links. A table column with a link can be used to perform actions based on the table cell being clicked or selected.

    • Method Detail

      • getLinkTheme

        public abstract java.lang.String getLinkTheme(java.lang.Object element,
                                              java.lang.String property)
        This method is called to get the table's link theme for extended table columns.
        Parameters:
        element - The element associated with the current row in the table for which the link is required.
        property - The property of the table column for which the link is is to be displayed.
        Returns:
        The theme for the link in the table column. If the theme entry defines an image, the image will be displayed in the table cell. If a null value is returned for a table cell, the link is not displayed.

      • linkSelected

        public abstract void linkSelected(java.lang.Object element,
                                  java.lang.String property)
        This method is called when a link in a table cell is clicked.
        Parameters:
        element - The element associated with the current row in the table. The element may be used to update the table row after performing the action on link.
        property - The property of the table column whose link was clicked.

      • linkSelected2

        public int linkSelected2(java.lang.Object element,
                         java.lang.String property)
        This method is called when a link in a table cell is clicked. Default Implemnetation calls linkSelected(Object, String) and returns CALL_DEFAULT_LINK_SELECTED

        The methods excpects integer as return type. Allowed Values:

        • OVERRIDE_APPLICATION_COLUMNS: Application method for link selection are called after this method
        • DO_NOT_OVERRIDE_APPLICATION_COLUMNS: Does not call application method for link selection. (DEFAULT)

        NOTE: return type is not considered for columns added through extensibility.

        Parameters:
        element -
        property -
        Returns:
        behavior policy for link selection

      • getStrategy

        public int getStrategy(java.lang.Object element,
                       java.lang.String property)
        This method supports overriding link behavior of application columns. ther behavior depends on the return value of the method. Allowed Values
        • OVERRIDE_APPLICATION_COLUMNS: Allow to override application behavior using extensibility. In this case getLinkTheme(Object, String) linkSelected2(Object, String) are called on YRCExtendedTableLinkProvider
        • DO_NOT_OVERRIDE_APPLICATION_COLUMNS: YRCExtendedTableLinkProvider will be used only for (DEFAULT)

        NOTE: Not applicable for columns added through extensibility.
        Parameters:
        element -
        property -
        Returns:
